title: A Governor's Big Speech After the President
summary: Governor Abigail Spanberger from Virginia will give a speech after President Trump talks to the country. This is called the Democratic response to the State of the Union. She is the first woman governor in Virginia and won her election by a lot. Her speech will talk about making things cheaper for families, protecting healthcare, and defending freedoms. It will happen on Tuesday night and you can watch it live. Other politicians have given similar speeches in the past, and sometimes people remember them or make fun of them. This is an important job in politics because it lets Democrats share their ideas.

background_read: The State of the Union is a yearly speech where the President tells Congress and the country about plans and achievements. After this, someone from the other party gives a response to share different ideas. Governor Spanberger is a Democrat who just became governor and will use this chance to talk about helping families. This is common in politics to show different views.
